alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Cleveland; Desha; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 12:07PM CDT until May 05 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Northern Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... Central Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1207 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Warbritton to near Lamont, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Dumas... Star City... Rison... White River National Wildlife R... White Hall... Gould... Gillett... Grady... Mitchellville... Watson... Whitefield... Little Bayou Meto Park... Woodville... Douglas... Trusten Holder WMA... Nebo... Feenyville... Yancopin... Cottondale... This includes Interstate 530 between mile markers 32 and 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
